Articles.Content:
So I've just started a new science mode play through. All is going well until I launch my first ship (Just a Mk1 capsule with Jeb in it strapped to a Flea) and up it goes! As soon as it hits ~6km my camera freezes while my ship continues to ascend. Then, when the ship begins to descend, my camera slowly trails behind it until it lands. Any suggestions?

EDIT: I seem to have found the issue (maybe). I had been flying with a Mk1 parachute, Ven's stock revamp, and realchute. When I took the Mk1 parachute off, the camera stopped having the issue. I'm sorry if this should have been in a modded forum but it wasn't a mod issue until now!

Edited July 21, 2015 by sneff30
Moved to modded support, in case others encounter the same issue.
